What is CaSScade'25?

CaSScade'25 isn't your everyday hackathon—it's a design-first chaos experiment where HTML, CSS, and JS collide in the most absurd, over-engineered ways possible.

It's not about building the perfect product, but about embracing the "why does this even exist?" energy of quirky prototypes.

From glitchy grids to unnecessarily complex flows, CaSScade'25 celebrates creativity that doesn't follow rules—it breaks them, then styles the cracks with neon gradients and cyberpunk vibes.

$ cascade-init --chaos-mode
Loading glitch protocols...
Initializing absurdity matrix...
Chaos engine ready for deployment.
▊
$ chaos-engine --activate
Breaking conventional rules...
Loading creative protocols...
Madness matrix online.
▊

Why Participate?

Because CaSScade isn't just another hackathon—it's a digital playground where chaos meets creativity.

It's where you take that wild idea, break it apart, and rebuild it with a splash of glitch and madness .

Every line of code is a chance to twist logic, every bug is an invitation to innovate, and every teammate is a co-conspirator in building something brilliantly bizarre.

Who Can Join?

CaSScade is open to anyone ready to tinker, twist, and tear apart the ordinary.

Whether you're a fresher scribbling your first HTML tag, a designer who dreams in pixels, or a coder who speaks in semicolons—this hackathon is your stage.

You don't need to be a pro; you just need curiosity, chaos, and the courage to experiment. If you've ever wanted to break the matrix of normal and stitch it back with your own glitch, then congratulations—you're already one of us.

$ matrix-break --initiate
Scanning for chaos potential...
Loading glitch protocols...
Welcome to the matrix, glitch.
▊

[PROTOCOL DIRECTIVE]

Mission Parameters:Design, develop, and deploy innovative solutions within the chaos matrix.

Execution Protocol:Embrace the glitch, innovate beyond boundaries, create the impossible.

[EVENT RULES]

[01]Teams of 2-4 participants maximum
[02]Use only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
[03]Original code and assets required
[04]48-hour development window
[05]Responsive design mandatory
[06]Submit via designated portal before deadline

[MISSION_TIMELINE]

The Absurdity Filter

Every idea passes through the first gate where logic is politely asked to leave. Judges don’t want “practical,” they want “beautifully broken.”

GATE_OPEN

The Frankenbuild

Now comes the part where wild imagination collides with no-code tools. Think of it as stitching random limbs together and calling it a prototype.

BUILDING

The Reality Checkpoint

Mentors descend like detectives in a sci-fi movie, poking holes in your design... you creatively disguise the holes with more nonsense.

ANALYZING

The Final Cascade

The stage lights turn on. It’s your moment to showcase a prototype so unnecessarily layered that it feels like a Rube Goldberg machine.

SHOWCASE

Curtain Drop of Chaos

Finally, the arena quiets, the winners are chosen, and the most gloriously inconvenient solution is crowned supreme.

COMPLETE

[FINAL_DIRECTIVE]

⚡ INCONVENIENCE IS THE MISSION

Your task: craft the most chaotically impractical yet still functional solutions to the simplest website bugs we throw at you.

⚡ REALITY IS BENDABLE

You hold full creative override. Twist the problem, break it, rebuild it—surprise the system with your own out-of-box hacks.

⚡ MACHINES MAY ASSIST, BUT YOU MUST COMMAND

Use AI tools, online vaults, and dark-web knowledge—but every line you run, you must be able to explain like it's your own battle code.

⚡ COPYPASTE IS A CRIME

Any act of one-to-one duplication, blind cloning, or direct plagiarism = instant disqualification. (We'll find you. The system always finds out.)

⚡ OPEN-ENDED GLITCH PROMPTS AWAIT

On event day, you'll choose your poison: open prompts designed to push you off the map. No fixed path. Only chaos. Only creativity.

FINAL WARNING

Only the most inconvenient yet cleverly engineered anomaly will rise. The rest will vanish into static.

CSI VIT

WE BUILD, IT MATTERS.

CSI VIT is a vibrant community of makers, breakers and innovators. We bring together developers, designers and problem solvers to explore cutting edge technology through hackathons, workshops and real world projects.

Backed by India's largest network of computer professionals, CSI VIT gives you the skills, exposure and platform to grow. Whether you want to code, design or disrupt, there is always a place for you here.
